Akali.Early Itemization: Dshield-Phage generally good but pickaxe if you have money for it
Akali.Comments: So you wanna bully her as mush as you can lvl 1-5 and not fight her at lvl 6. She will burst you 100-0, Fight her again at lvl 7-9 build tanky so you dont die to burst. Make sure to use auto attacks a lot while shes in your w and do qs in her shroud. Take red trinket to cc her with qs in her shroud

Camille.Early Itemization: D-Blade- Whip-Phage-Goredrnker. You need damage to break her shield and grasp
Camille.Difficulty: VERY HARD(it becomes easier when you fight camilles for a whole season im pretty sure ive beaten about 300 camilles at this point this lady needs nerfs)
Camille.Comments: Let her get lvl 1 prio she will win trades very hard and sack wave.                if shes letting you cs DONT she will beat you in trades no matter what                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      You have to build max damage and intiate the fight dont let her e on you if she does, use your e to dodge down towards your lane at lvl 5 you have kill pressure dont let her auto you when doing your q combo so she doesnt proc passive and stay away from walls you can cancell her e with your q and dash away from her w if you can.

Aatrox.Trading Pattern in Laning Phase: Wait for him to use Q1 into E for poke then wait out his Q ramp up for a bit. His cds are extremly high early game without 40% cdr so if he uses it for poke/wave clear he wont have abilities to counter your all in. Always use your ult to dodge his 3rd Q in his R because he will never get to cast it twice.
Aatrox.Wave Management: He will auto-shove with his Q's anyway so try to keep the wave even and in the middle, never all in unless he used an ability, he heavy outdmgs your rotation
Aatrox.Runes: Conq-triumph-bloodline-last stand  and bash + bone plating
Aatrox.Items: Rush exe calling into normal camille build tri force - ravenous
Aatrox.Teamfight vs Splitpush: U can do both depending if ahead or behind, if ahead do whatever is best for your team u beat him on side really easily so just shove and rotate

Akali.Trading Pattern in Laning Phase: start W and max E, poke her with W whenever its up it will sustain you thourgh  the lane, stick close to walls most akalis wont have the brain to react to your fast hookshot with E which will give u a lot of free kills, no need to rush mr besides mercs just dont eat too many Q's and you should be fine, when her 2nd R is ready spam your ultimatum on your face so you will dodge it 9/10 times.
Akali.Wave Management: Manage waves in a way that they are either close to her tower or your tower, if wave is in the middle u cant touch her at all, freezes are super broken here
Akali.Teamfight vs Splitpush: Only split after 2 items or split safely to farm. in 5v5's u do the same thing what akali does
